asdf.name: the daily poll
asdf.purpose: Develop a simple poll answering game.
asdf.description: It's a simple website where you can answer a new poll daily and see what other users voted. The front end is React and it connects to a Firebase database on clientside.

asdf.name: Spotify Music Mapping
asdf.purpose: Create a fun project, creating a project that I wanted to share.
asdf.description: It's basically a website that does everyhting on the front end. It's gonna like take your music and cobine it with your friends music and then you can see cool shit.

projects.name: Splatter Bug
projects.description: A simple to use bug tracking service providing managers and teams a great way to track their projects. It's a full stack application created from Node.js, React, and the backend is MongoDB.

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: I created this website as a way to track my progress and display my projects. It was a great way to practice creating react websites with animations!
